short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tool for generating strong and secure passwords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A password generator is a tool that creates unique and random passwords for users to help secure their online accounts. The generator typically allows users to specify the length and complexity of the password, such as including uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. This can make it more difficult for hackers to guess or brute-force the password, increasing the overall security of the user's online accounts.
